data.eml:eml: A new amphibious troglobitic styloniscid from Brazil (Isopoda, Oniscidea, Synocheta)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bastos-Pereira, Rafaela, Souza, Leila Aparecida, Ferreira, Rodrigo L. (2017): A new amphibious troglobitic styloniscid from Brazil (Isopoda, Oniscidea, Synocheta). Zootaxa 4294 (2): 292-300, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.2.11
